submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        c = Counter()
        c1 = Counter()
        for i in range(n//2):
            t = abs(nums[i] - nums[n-1-i])
            t1 = max(nums[i], nums[n-1-i],k-nums[i], k-nums[n-1-i])
            c1[t1] += 1
            c[t] += 1
        c = sorted(c.items())
        c1 = sorted(c1.items())
        ans = inf
        j = 0
        cnt = 0
        p = len(c1)
        n //= 2
        # print(c,c1)
        for f, v in c:
            while j < p and c1[j][0] < f:
                cnt += c1[j][1] 
                j += 1
            # print(cnt,v)
            ans = min(ans, cnt + n - v)
        return ans
